EmailTemplate.name: Request a Trial.Marketo Follow-up - Email 2 (Manual Testing with Tosca) - Versio
EmailTemplate.subject: Manual Testing with Tosca
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Manual Testing with Tosca
Dear {{lead.First Name}},
Are Manual Test Cases important to your test projects? If so, check out how Tosca allows you to manage manual test cases individually as well as in combination with your automated test portfolio.
Learn more about Manual Testing with Tosca here:
- How to Execute Manual Tests Video <http://go.tricentis.com/jtNC012LX005T0NXL3Y0t00> - Working with Manual Test Cases Guide <https://support.tricentis.com/community/manuals_detail.do?sysparm_document_key=u_webhelp,3bcc38b137abf900b1f1ab2943990ec0>
Best wishes,
The Tricentis Team trial@tricentis.com <mailto:trial@tricentis.com>
Free Support Available Our award winning support team is available anytime between Monday to Friday. You can reach them by Phone <https://support.tricentis.com/community/phone.do> | e-mail <mailto:support@tricentis.com>
Product and Licensing For further questions regarding product or licensing, please contact our Tricentis sales team: Website <http://innovate.tricentis.com/talk-with-sales.html> | e-mail <mailto:sales@tricentis.com>
